entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-02-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: income differences between various social strata, income distribution, inequality of incomes, the sources of inequalities; changes since 1967; differences, distrubution, and inequality of wages and salaries; connection between salaries and family incomes
entry.dcterms:subject: social stratification and groupings
health care and medical treatment
social welfare policy and systems
economic conditions and indicators
housing
income, property and savings
education, school
agriculture

family life, marriage, relationship
labour and employment
demography
economic systems and development
entry.dcterms:coverage: Budapest, and Bács-Kiskun, Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén, Hajdú-Bihar and Pest counties
entry.dcterms:subject: household
survey data
time-series
0.5% of households in Budapest and in Bács-Kiskun, Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén, Hajdú-Bihar, and Pest counties; 1% elsewhere.
Questionnaire with interviewers and self-administered questionnaires mailed to employers.
A
